articles.author: Zack Whittaker, Sarah Perez
articles.title: Viral call-recording app Neon goes dark after exposing users' phone numbers, call recordings, and transcripts - TechCrunch
articles.description: Call recording app Neon was one of the top-ranked iPhone apps, but was pulled offline after a security bug allowed any logged-in user to access the call recordings and transcripts of any other user.
articles.content: A viral app called Neon, which offers to record your phone calls and pay you for the audio so it can sell that data to AI companies, has rapidly risen to the ranks of the top-five free iPhone apps si… [+4908 chars]

articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Pulse to proactively write you morning briefs - TechCrunch
articles.description: Pulse is part of a broader shift in OpenAI's consumer products, which are lately being designed to work for users asynchronously instead of responding to questions.
articles.content: OpenAI is launching a new feature inside of ChatGPT called Pulse, which generates personalized reports for users while they sleep. Pulse offers users five to 10 briefs that can get them up to speed o… [+4501 chars]
